output:
when: elasticsearch_curator_enabled
tags:
- elasticsearch-curator
block:
- name: Install pip package
  package:
    name: python3-pip
    state: present
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Install elasticsearch pip
  when: elasticsearch_curator_library | default(False)
  pip:
    name: elasticsearch
    state: present
    version: ''
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Install curator pip
  pip:
    name: elasticsearch-curator
    state: present
    version: 8.0.8
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Create config directory
  file:
    path: /root/.curator
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: u=rwX,g=rX,o=
    state: directory
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Write general config
  notify:
  - Restart curator
  template:
    src: config.j2
    dest: /root/.curator/curator.yml
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: u=rw,g=r,o=
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Write actions config
  notify:
  - Restart curator
  template:
    src: actions.j2
    dest: /root/.curator/actions.yml
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: u=rw,g=r,o=
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Write timer file
  notify:
  - Restart curator
  template:
    src: timer.j2
    dest: /etc/systemd/system/curator.timer
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: u=rw,g=r,o=r
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Write service file
  notify:
  - Restart curator
  template:
    src: service.j2
    dest: /etc/systemd/system/curator.service
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: u=rw,g=r,o=r
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
- name: Start curator timer
  systemd:
    name: curator.timer
    state: started
    daemon_reload: true
    masked: false
    enabled: true
  tags:
  - elasticsearch-curator
starcoder-response:
name: Install if enabled

- build

- name: Create an MX record for the domain
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: MX
    mx: mailhost.
    owner: MX
    content: mx: mailhost.
  with_items:
  -.
  -.au
- name: Create an A record for the domain
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: A
    owner: NS
    content: ns1.
    dns_servers:
    - 127.0.0.1
- name: Create an NS record
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: NS
    owner: NS
    content: ns1.
  with_items:
  -.
  -.au
- name: Create an PTR record
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: PTR
    owner: PTR
    content: ptr1.
    dns_servers:
    - 127.0.0.1
  with_items:
  -.
  -.au
- name: Create an MX record for the domain
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: MX
    owner: MX
    content: mx: mailhost.
  with_items:
  -.
  -.au
- name: Create an A record for the domain
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: A
    owner: NS
    content: ns1.
    dns_servers:
    - 127.0.0.1
- name: Create an NS record
  mgit_record:
    name: ''
    type: NS
    owner: NS
    content: ns1.
  with_items:
  -.
  -.au
- name: Create an PTR record

  -.
  -.au

name: Copy indexer templates
  ansible.builtin.template:
    src: ''
    dest: ''
    owner: root
    group: solr
    mode: 420
    backup: true
  loop:
  - src: templates/conf.d/kibana.conf.j2
    dest: /etc/solr/conf.d/kibana.conf
  notify: Restart Solr Linux
- name: Copy Kibana index template
  ansible.builtin.template:
    src: ''
    dest: /usr/share/kibana4/index-pattern-.json
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: 420
    backup: true
  loop:
  - src: templates/index_patterns/nginx.json.j2
    dest: /usr/share/kibana4/index-pattern-nginx.json
  - src: templates/index_patterns/syslog.json.j2
    dest: /usr/share/kibana4/index-pattern-syslog.json
  notify: Restart Kibana
- name: Copy configmaps for Ingress controller
  ansible.builtin.template:
    src: ''
    dest: /tmp/
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: 420
  loop:
  - src: etc/ingress-controller/ssl.crt
    dest: ingress-controller/ssl.crt
  - src: etc/ingress-controller/ssl.key
    dest: ingress-controller/ssl.key
  - src: etc/ingress-controller/ca.crt
    dest: ingress-controller/ca.crt
  notify: Restart Ingress controller
- name: Create Kibana configmap for ingress controller
  shell: kubectl create configmap kibana-config --from-file=/tmp/ingress-controller/ --namespace kibana
  environment:
    KUBECONFIG: /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf
  become_user: ''
  become_method: sudo
  when: install_kibana

to Disabled
block:
- name: SCORED | 18.5.9.1 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Turn on Mapper IO LLTDIO driver is set
    to Disabled | AllowLLTDIOOndomain
  win_regedit:
    path: HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Lltd
    name: AllowLLTDIOOndomain
    data: 0
    type: dword
- name: SCORED | 18.5.9.1 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Turn on Mapper IO LLTDIO driver is set
    to Disabled | AllowLLTDIOOnPublicNet
  win_regedit:
    path: HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Lltd
    name: AllowLLTDIOOnPublicNet
    data: 0
    type: dword
- name: SCORED | 18.5.9.1 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Turn on Mapper IO LLTDIO driver is set
    to Disabled | EnableLLTDIO
  win_regedit:
    path: HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Lltd
    name: EnableLLTDIO
    data: 0
    type: dword
- name: SCORED | 18.5.9.1 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Turn on Mapper IO LLTDIO driver is set
    to Disabled | ProhibitLLTDIOOnPrivateNet
  win_regedit:
    path: HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Lltd
    name: ProhibitLLTDIOOnPrivateNet
    data: 0
    type: dword

input: name: Ensure Teleport is installed in Debian.
output:
apt:
  name: teleport
  state: present
starcoder-response:
name: Ensure Teleport is installed in Debian.

Answer: block:
- name: Install Teleport
  when: teleport_bin.stat.exists
  block:
  - name: Create teleport install directory.
    ansible.builtin.file:
      path: /usr/local/bin
      state: directory
      owner: root
      group: root
      mode: u=rwx,go=rx
      recurse: true
  - name: Copy Teleport binary to install directory.
    ansible.builtin.copy:
      src: /bin/teleport
      dest: /usr/local/bin/teleport
      owner: root
      group: root
      mode: u=rwx,go=rx
      remote_src: true
  - name: Create teleport systemd service.
    ansible.builtin.template:
      src: teleport.service.j2
      dest: /etc/systemd/system/teleport.service
      owner: root
      group: root
      mode: u=rw,go=r
    notify: Reload_Teleport
- name: Install Teleport from source
  when:
  - teleport_bin.stat.exists
  block:
  - name: Create teleport install directory.
    ansible.builtin.file:
      path: /usr/local/bin
      state: directory
      owner: root
      group: root
      mode: u=rwx,go=rx
      recurse: true
  - name: Install Teleport from source.
    ansible.builtin.unarchive:
      src: /bin/teleport
      dest: /usr/local/bin
      owner: root
      group: root
      mode: u=rwx,go=rx
      remote_src: true
  - name: Create teleport systemd service.
    ansible.builtin.template:
      src: teleport.service.j2
      dest: /etc/systemd/system/teleport.service
      owner: root
      group: root
      mode: u=rw,go=r
    notify: Reload_Teleport

output:
get_url:
  url: http://download.jetbrains.com/upsource/upsource-2017.3.2593.zip
  dest: /tmp/upsource-2017.3.2593.zip
  validate_certs: false
tags:
- upsource
starcoder-response:
name: UpSource | Get distribution major version
  ansible.builtin.shell: cat /etc/redhat-release | sed's/.*\.\([0-9]\).*/\1/'
  register: upsource_redhat_major_version
  changed_when: false
  check_mode: false
- name: UpSource | Set $release in /etc/default/grub if not defined
  ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
    dest: /etc/default/grub
    regexp: ^GRUB_DEFAULT=
    line: GRUB_DEFAULT="--unrestricted"
    state: present
  when: upsource_redhat_major_version.stdout!= upsource_distribution_major_version
  notify:
  - Update grub
- name: UpSource | Check if /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pve-non-free.list exists
  ansible.builtin.stat:
    path: /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pve-non-free.list
  register: pve_non_free_list_file
- name: UpSource | Add pve non-free repository
  ansible.builtin.apt_repository:
    repo: deb http://download.upsource.com/non-free/apt pve-non-free main
    filename: pve-non-free
    state: present
    update_cache: true
  when: pve_non_free_list_file.stat.exists is defined and not pve_non_free_list_file.stat.exists

input: name: Create public instance security group
output:
ec2_group:
  name: PublicSecurityGroup
  description: Public instance security group
  vpc_id: ''
  rules:
  - proto: tcp
    from_port: '80'
    to_port: '80'
    cidr_ip: 0.0.0.0/0
  - proto: tcp
    from_port: '443'
    to_port: '443'
    cidr_ip: 0.0.0.0/0
  - proto: tcp
    from_port: '22'
    to_port: '22'
    cidr_ip: ''
  rules_egress:
  - proto: tcp
    from_port: '22'
    to_port: '22'
    group_name: PrivateSecurityGroup
  - proto: tcp
    from_port: '80'
    to_port: '80'
    cidr_ip: 0.0.0.0/0

output: include_tasks: reset_kubernetes.yml
starcoder-response:
name: reset prev kuber cluster

Answer: block:
- name: delete all k8s cluster
  mafalb.containers.k8s_cluster:
    state: absent
    force: true
  register: result
- assert:
    that:
    - result is changed
- name: create k8s cluster with different version
  mafalb.containers.k8s_cluster:
    version: 1.17.2
  register: result
- assert:
    that:
    - result is changed
    - result.data is defined
    - result.data.cluster is defined
    - result.data.cluster.server is defined
    - result.data.cluster.server == "https://127.0.0.1:6443"
    - result.data.cluster.certificate_authority is defined
    - result.data.cluster.certificate_authority | length > 0
    - result.data.cluster.insecure_skip_tls_verify is defined
    - result.data.cluster.insecure_skip_tls_verify | bool == true
    - result is not changed
always:
- name: delete all k8s cluster
  mafalb.containers.k8s_cluster:
    state: absent
    force: true

output:
become: true
block:
- name: Copy fail2ban
  copy:
    src: /etc/fail2ban/jail.conf
    dest: /etc/fail2ban/jail.local
    remote_src: true
- name: Update fail2ban policy
  lineinfile:
    dest: /etc/fail2ban/jail.local
    regexp: ^bantime  = 600$
    line: bantime  = 20000
- name: Restart fail2ban
  service:
    name: fail2ban
    state: restarted

name: Setup fail2ban (ssh protection)

  src: etc_fail2ban_jail.d_ssh.conf.j2
  dest: /etc/fail2ban/jail.d/ssh.conf
  owner: root
  group: root
  mode: 420
notify: reload fail2ban

output:
when: not tmux_version_installed.stdout is search(tmux_version)
block:
- name: Gathering facts
  ansible.builtin.setup:
    gather_subset: min
- name: Installing Ubuntu/Debian dependencies
  ansible.builtin.apt:
    name:
    - automake
    - bison
    - gcc
    - git
    - libevent-dev
    - libncurses5-dev
    - make
    - pkg-config
    state: present
  when: ansible_pkg_mgr == 'apt'
- name: Installing Fedora/EL dependencies
  ansible.builtin.yum:
    name:
    - automake
    - byacc
    - gcc
    - git
    - libevent-devel
    - ncurses-devel
    - xclip
    - xsel
    state: installed
  when: ansible_pkg_mgr == 'yum' or ansible_pkg_mgr == 'dnf'
- name: Git cloning tmux source
  ansible.builtin.git:
    repo: https://github.com/tmux/tmux.git
    dest: /usr/src/tmux
    version: 3.3a
- name: Running autogen.sh
  ansible.builtin.command: /bin/sh autogen.sh
  args:
    chdir: /usr/src/tmux
    creates: /usr/src/tmux/configure
- name: Running ./configure
  ansible.builtin.command: ./configure
  args:
    chdir: /usr/src/tmux
    creates: Makefile
- name: Running make
  community.general.make:
    chdir: /usr/src/tmux
    params:
      NUMTHREADS: 4
- name: Installing via make install
  community.general.make:
    chdir: /usr/src/tmux
    target: install
- name: Adding /usr/local/bin to PATH via /etc/profile.d/tmux.sh
  ansible.builtin.copy:
    src: tmux.sh
    dest: /etc/profile.d/tmux.sh
    mode: '0644'
  when: ansible_os_family == 'RedHat'
starcoder-response:
name: Installing Tmux from source

Answer: command: make install
args:
  chdir: /tmp/tmux-2.6
become: true
when: tmux_source.changed

output:
unarchive:
  remote_src: true
  src: /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.23.tar.gz
  dest: /opt
  owner: tomcat
  group: tomcat
  mode: 493
  creates: /opt/apache-tomcat-8.5.23
starcoder-response:
name: Unarchiving Tomcat 8.5.23 to /opt/tomcat
  unarchive:
    src: /tmp/tomcat-ansible/tomcat-8.5.23.tar.gz
    dest: /opt/tomcat
    remote_src: true
    creates: /opt/tomcat/bin
- name: Copying Server Config
  copy:
    src: ''
    dest: ''
    owner: tomcat
    group: tomcat
    mode: 416
- name: Setting permissions on server.xml
  file:
    path: /opt/tomcat/conf/server.xml
    owner: tomcat
    group: tomcat
    mode: 416
- name: Creating tomcat user
  user:
    name: tomcat
    home: /opt/tomcat
    createhome: true
    state: present
    system: true
- name: Setting permissions on tomcat user home
  file:
    path: /opt/tomcat
    owner: tomcat
    group: tomcat
    mode: 493
- name: Adding tomcat to sudoers
  lineinfile:
    path: /etc/sudoers
    state: present
    line: 'tomcat ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:/opt/tomcat/bin/tomcat start

  '
  owner: root
  group: root
  mode: 420
- name: Restarting Tomcat

input: name: Setup Docker repository to install docker engine on Ubuntu
output:
block:
- name: Install packages to use a repository over HTTPS
  apt:
    name: ''
    update_cache: true
    force_apt_get: true
  vars:
    packages:
    - apt-transport-https
    - ca-certificates
    - curl
    - gnupg-agent
    - software-properties-common
    - aptitude
- name: Add Docker GPG key
  apt_key:
    url: https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg
    id: 9DC858229FC7DD38854AE2D88D81803C0EBFCD88
- name: Add Docker repository
  apt_repository:
    repo: deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu  stable
- name: Enable cgroup memory and swapaccount
  lineinfile:
    dest: /etc/default/grub
    regexp: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX=
    line: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX="cgroup_enable=memory swapaccount=1"
  register: docker_cgroup
  when: docker_enable_cgroup_memory_and_swapaccount
- name: Update grub
  command: update-grub2
  register: docker_kernel
  when: docker_cgroup is changed
- name: Reboot server if docker kernel is changed
  reboot: null
  when: docker_kernel is changed
when: ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu"
starcoder-response:
name: Setup Docker repository to install docker engine on Ubuntu

Answer: apt_repository:
  repo: deb [arch=] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu  stable
  state: present
  filename: docker
  update_cache: true
when: ansible_distribution == 'Ubuntu'

output:
experiences is set to Enabled
block:
- name: SCORED | 19.7.7.3 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Do not use diagnostic data for tailored
    experiences is set to Enabled
  win_regedit:
    path: HKU:\.DEFAULT\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\CloudContent
    name: DisableTailoredExperiencesWithDiagnosticData
    data: 1
    type: dword
- name: SCORED | 19.7.7.3 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Do not use diagnostic data for tailored
    experiences is set to Enabled
  win_regedit:
    path: HKCU:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\CloudContent
    name: DisableTailoredExperiencesWithDiagnosticData
    data: 1
    type: dword
when: rule_19_7_7_3
tags:
- level2
- rule_19.7.7.3
- patch
starcoder-response:
name: SCORED | 19.7.7.3 | PATCH | L2 Ensure Do not use diagnostic data for tailored

Answer:   experiences is set to Enabled

  path: HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\System
  name: EnableCdp
  data: 0
  type: dword

input: name: SCORED | 17.6.4 | PATCH | (L1) Ensure 'Audit Removable Storage' is set to 'Success
output:
and Failure'
block:
- name: SCORED | 17.6.4 | AUDIT | (L1) Ensure 'Audit Removable Storage' is set to
    'Success and Failure' | Get current settings
  win_shell: AuditPol /get /subcategory:"Removable Storage" -r | ConvertFrom-Csv |
    Select-Object -expand "Inclusion Setting"
  changed_when: false
  failed_when: false
  register: rule_17_6_4_audit
- name: SCORED | 17.6.4 | PATCH | (L1) Ensure 'Audit Removable Storage' is set to
    'Success and Failure' | Set success
  win_shell: AuditPol /set /subcategory:"Removable Storage" /success:enable
  changed_when: '''Success'' not in rule_17_6_4_audit.stdout'
  when: '''Success'' not in rule_17_6_4_audit.stdout'
- name: SCORED | 17.6.4 | PATCH | (L1) Ensure 'Audit Removable Storage' is set to
    'Success and Failure' | Set failure
  win_shell: AuditPol /set /subcategory:"Removable Storage" /failure:enable
  changed_when: '''failure'' not in rule_17_6_4_audit.stdout'
  when: '''Failure'' not in rule_17_6_4_audit.stdout'
when:
- rule_17_6_4
tags:
- level1-domaincontroller
- level1-memberserver
- rule_17.6.4
- patch
starcoder-response:
name: SCORED | 17.6.4 | PATCH | (L1) Ensure 'Audit Removable Storage' is set to 'Success

Answer:   and Failure'
win_shell: AuditPol /set /subcategory:"Removable Storage" /success:enable
changed_when: '''Success'' not in rule_17_6_4_audit.stdout'
when:
- rule_17_6_4
- rule_17_6_4_audit is defined
- '''Success'' not in rule_17_6_4_audit.stdout'
tags:
- level1
- level2
- rule_17.6.4
- patch

name: Create wildcard certificate
  ansible.builtin.command:
    cmd: 'certbot certonly --non-interactive --agree-tos --email john_doe@example.com
      --webroot -w /var/www/html -d "www.example.com" -d "*.example.com" --rsa-key-size
      4096 --keep-until-expiring --expand'
  args:
    creates: /etc/letsencrypt/live/www.example.com
- name: Copy certificate to remote server
  ansible.builtin.copy:
    src: /etc/letsencrypt/live/www.example.com/fullchain.pem
    dest: /home//.ssl/fullchain.pem
    owner: ''
    group: ''
    mode: 420
  become: true
- name: Copy certificate key to remote server
  ansible.builtin.copy:
    src: /etc/letsencrypt/live/www.example.com/privkey.pem
    dest: /home//.ssl/privkey.pem
    owner: ''
    group: ''
    mode: 416
  become: true

starcoder-response:
name: Create public network ""
  docker_network:
    name: ''
- name: Create container with public network
  docker_container:
    name: container
    image: alpine:3.7
    networks:
    - name: ''
    command: echo "hello world"
  register: image
- name: Test container with public network
  assert:
    that:
    - image is changed
    - image.before is defined
    - image.before.State == 'created'
    - image.before.Containers == []
    - image.before.Options is defined
    - image.before.Options.network_mode == ""
    - image.after is defined
    - image.after.State == 'created'
    - image.after.Containers == []
    - image.after.Options is defined
    - image.after.Options.network_mode == ""
always:
- name: Remove public network
  docker_network:
    name: ''
    state: absent

name: download nginx-prometheus-exporter

    dest: /nginx-prometheus-exporter
    mode: 493

- name: build nginx-prometheus-exporter
  command: go build
  args:
    chdir: /nginx-prometheus-exporter

- name: copy binary

    src: /nginx-prometheus-exporter
    dest: '{{ prometheus_exporter_dist_dir }}/nginx-prometheus-exporter'
    remote_src: true
    mode: 493
  register: nginx_exporter_install
- name: remove temporary directories
  file:
    path: ''
    state: absent
  with_items:
  - /nginx-prometheus-exporter
  - /nginx-prometheus-exporter-0.9.0.tar.gz
when: nginx_exporter_force_reinstall or nginx_exporter_check is failed or nginx_exporter_version  not

    gateway_ip: 10.244.2.2
  loop:
  - 172.20.0.1/16

  - 192.168.0.0/16
- name: Disabling Windows Update
  lowlydba.sqlserver.win_updates:
    disable: true
  register: result
- assert:
    that:
    - result.data.ComputerName!= None
    - result.data.InstanceName!= None
    - result.data.SqlInstance!= None
    - result.data.DisableWindowsUpdate is true
- name: Enforcing Reboot
  lowlydba.sqlserver.win_updates:
    enable: true
    rereboot: true
  register: result
- assert:
    that:
    - result.data.ComputerName!= None
    - result.data.InstanceName!= None
    - result.data.SqlInstance!= None
    - result.data.NeedsReboot is true
    - result.data.Rereboot is true

output:
block:
- name: Update OS packages to latest
  package:
    name: '*'
    state: latest
- name: Install dependencies
  package:
    name: ''
    state: latest
  loop: glibc.i686libstdc++.i686
- name: Create steam system user
  user:
    name: steam
    comment: SteamCMD system user
    create_home: true
    shell: /bin/false
    system: true
- name: Create the SteamCMD directory
  file:
    path: /var/lib/steam
    state: directory
    mode: 480
    owner: steam
    group: steam
- name: Download SteamCMD installer
  unarchive:
    src: https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
    dest: /var/lib/steam
    remote_src: true
    owner: steam
    group: steam
- name: Set permissions for SteamCMD directory
  file:
    path: /var/lib/steam
    owner: steam
    group: steam
    recurse: true
- name: Run the installer script
  shell: su - steam -s /bin/bash -c '/var/lib/steam/steamcmd.sh +quit'
- name: Set permissions on SteamCMD script
  file:
    path: /var/lib/steam/steamcmd.sh
    owner: steam
    group: steam
    mode: 504
- name: Include SteamCMD in OS bin path
  template:
    src: templates/steamcmd.j2
    dest: /usr/bin/steamcmd
    owner: root
    group: steam
    mode: 493
when: steamCheck.rc != 0
